title: I want to read a suspense thriller novel. Can anyone suggest me? - Quora

response.answer_text: War stories, spies, espionage read Glenn Meade’s Sands of Sakkara or Brandenburg or Snow Wolf. Historical, conspiracies Glenn Meade’s The Romanov Conspiracy Ken Follett’s Jack Daws or Eye of the Needle Indian: Read any politician biography - its full of suspense, thriller, shocking, won't sleep for two three days :) :)\U0001f61c\U0001f61c
Lately I’m hooked to crime mysteries by Japanese author, Keigo Higashino The Devotion of Suspect XSalvation of a SaintMaybe you will like them…
